ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:00:10 [Issue ID 4000-103425] urn:comicvine:4000-103425 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:43:59. [Issue ID 229544]
ComicInfo.Summary: Vampirella's childhood in Eden is shown, with her receiving her distinctive costume - spun for her by two spiders in Eden (Satyr and Circe) - and being sent to Earth to deal with Lilith's previous offspring, Madek and Magdalene. Vampirella's wounds are healed by one of Adam's Outcasts and we see Magdalene's latest children, the Black Seraphim.
ComicInfo.Title: The Mystery Walk Part 4 - Light Dawns
ComicInfo.Colorist: Kevin Horn,Rod Perez,Bear Byte Graphics,Kevin Horn,Rod Perez,Bear Byte Graphics
